overview_of_class: French 121-3 is the third quarter of a three-quarter course for students who have completed French 121-2 or have been placed in that course by the French department. The aim of the course is to develop students' communication skills and cultural knowledge. Class meets four times a week. No P/N allowed.
name: Intermediate French
subject: FRENCH
